newsitem.title: USA: Reliance's RCG says buys Integrated Systems.
newsitem.headline: Reliance's RCG says buys Integrated Systems.

text.p: Reliance Group Holding's RCG Information Technology said Thursday it has acquired the privately held Integrated Systems Resources Inc.
Terms of the deal were not disclosed.

RCG Information Technology provides information technology solutions for the year 2000 problem. The year 2000 problem refers to the fact that many computer systems are not programmed to read years ending with 00 accurately, and computer crashes are expected as a result.
Information Systems is information systems consulting firm specializing in quality assurance, software testing services, supplemental staffing and systems integration services.
